content: First and foremost, as we talked about on this call, not a lot of new news on the cost of capital in the general rate case, we are waiting, as our most of the water utilities in the state of California that are regulated by the PUC that will create some short-term regulatory uncertainty as we wait for the two key decisions. Well, obviously, as we move into the first quarter, all eyes are on the California Public Utilities Commission, resolving the cost of capital and getting a PD out, and hopefully getting a general rate case decision out sometime in 2023.
